P

Percentage - Class in com.example.appproject
The Percentage Class manages the percentages.
Percentage(double) - Constructor for class com.example.appproject.Percentage
This constructor method creates a new Percentage object with a value between 0 and 1 or throws an exception if value is not in that interval.
Percentage(String) - Constructor for class com.example.appproject.Percentage
This constructor method creates a Percentage object from a String value, example : 50% = 0.5.
position(int, int) - Method in class com.example.appproject.Cursor
The position method is used to implement the POS instruction and MOV instruction.
position(Percentage, Percentage, int, int) - Method in class com.example.appproject.Cursor
The POS and MOV methods can be used with percentages of the dimensions of the canvas.
positionX - Variable in class com.example.appproject.Cursor
The coordinate on the abscissa axis.
positionY - Variable in class com.example.appproject.Cursor
The coordinate on the ordinate axis.
